00044  * class TREX::europa::details::UpdateIterator

00046 
00047 TREX::europa::details::UpdateIterator::UpdateIterator(SynchronizationManager &manager, Assembly &assembly)
00048 :EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawIterator(manager), m_assembly(assembly), m_it(assembly.internal_begin()), m_synch(manager) {
00049   advance();
00050 }
00051 
00052 EUROPA::EntityId const TREX::europa::details::UpdateIterator::nextCandidate() {
00053   EUROPA::EntityId candidate;
00054     
00055   if( m_assembly.internal_end()!=m_it ) {
00056     candidate = *m_it;
00057     ++m_it;
00058   }
00059   return candidate;
00060 }

00068 bool TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::customStaticMatch(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00069   return InternalStateId::convertable(entity);

00074 TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::DecisionPoint(EUROPA::DbClientId const &client, 
00075                                                                    TREX::europa::details::InternalStateId const &timeline,
00076                                                                    EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &config, 
00077                                                                    EUROPA::LabelStr const &explanation)
00078 :EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionPoint(client, timeline->getKey(), explanation),
00079  m_target(timeline), m_predicates(timeline->predicates()) { 
00080 }
00081 
00082 std::string TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::toString() const {
00083   return toShortString();
00084 }
00085 
00086 std::string TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::toShortString() const {
00087   std::ostringstream oss;
00088  
00089   oss<<"trex_";
00090   
00091   if( m_choices.none() ) 
00092     oss<<"EMPTY";
00093   else {
00094     switch( m_prev_idx ) {
00095       case EXTEND_CURRENT:
00096         oss<<"EXTEND["<<m_target->m_last->toString()<<']';
00097         break;
00098       case START_NEXT:
00099         oss<<"START["<<(*m_tok)->toString()<<']';
00100         break;
00101       case CREATE_DEFAULT:
00102         oss<<"DEFAULT";
00103         break;
00104       case CREATE_OTHER:
00105         oss<<"CREATE["<<m_pred->toString()<<']';
00106         break;
00107       default:
00108         oss<<"ERROR"; // this is bad !!!
00109     }
00110   }
00111   oss<<'('<<m_target->getTimeline()->toString()<<'['<<m_target->getTime()<<"])";
00112   return oss.str();  
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 bool TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::hasNext() const {
00117   return m_idx<m_choices.size();
00118 }
00119 
00120 bool TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::canUndo() const {
00121   return EUROPA::SOLVERS::DecisionPoint::canUndo();
00122 }
00123 
00124 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::advance() {
00125   // Go to the next possible global choice
00126   do {
00127     ++m_idx;
00128   } while(m_idx<m_choices.size() && !m_choices[m_idx]);
00129 }
00130 
00131 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::handleInitialize() {
00132   m_choices.reset(); // Just to be safe  
00133   m_choices.set(CREATE_DEFAULT);
00134   
00135   
00136   // Check If I have an observation I can extend
00137   if( m_target->m_last.isId() ) {
00138     EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &end = m_target->m_last->getActiveToken()->end()->lastDomain();
00139     if( end.getLowerBound()<=m_target->getTime() )
00140       m_choices.set(EXTEND_CURRENT, end.getUpperBound()>m_target->getTime());
00141     else { 
00142       // Already decided
00143       m_choices.reset();
00144       return;
00145     }
00146   }
00147   
00148   // Check if there's any token that can become the new observation
00149   boost::tie(m_from, m_to) = m_target->getActiveCandidates();
00150   if( m_from!=m_to ) {
00151     m_choices.set(START_NEXT, m_from!=m_to);
00152     
00153     // Now look for the things I can get rid of on other choices
00154     for(sequence::const_iterator i=m_from; m_to!=i; ++i) {
00155       if( m_target->default_pred()== (*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName() )
00156         m_choices.reset(CREATE_DEFAULT);
00157       else 
00158         m_predicates.erase((*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName());
00159     }
00160     m_tok = m_from;
00161   }
00162   
00163   // The last flag is to create alternate tokens (other than default)
00164   m_choices.set(CREATE_OTHER, !m_predicates.empty());
00165   m_pred = m_predicates.begin();
00166 
00167   // initialize m_idx to the first bit which is true
00168   for(m_idx=0; m_idx<m_choices.size() && !m_choices[m_idx]; ++m_idx);
00169   m_prev_idx = m_idx;
00170 }
00171 
00172 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::handleExecute() {
00173   EUROPA::TokenId tok;
00174   
00175   m_prev_idx = m_idx; 
00176   switch(m_idx) {
00177     case EXTEND_CURRENT:
00178       m_target->push_end(m_client);
00179       break;
00180     case START_NEXT:
00181       tok = m_target->newToken(m_client, (*m_tok)->getPredicateName().toString());
00182       m_client->merge(tok, *m_tok);
00183       break;
00184     case CREATE_DEFAULT:
00185       tok = m_target->newToken(m_client, m_target->predicate_name(m_target->default_pred()), true);
00186       break;
00187     case CREATE_OTHER:
00188       tok = m_target->newToken(m_client, m_target->predicate_name(*m_pred), true);
00189       break;
00190     default:
00191       throw EuropaException("Unknown synchronization decision for timeline "+m_target->getTimeline()->toString());
00192   }
00193 }
00194 
00195 void TREX::europa::details::InternalState::DecisionPoint::handleUndo() {
00196   // this is where we select the next choice
00197   switch(m_idx) {
00198     case EXTEND_CURRENT:
00199       m_target->release_end(m_client);
00200       advance();
00201       break;
00202     case START_NEXT:      
00203       m_target->removeToken();
00204       ++m_tok;
00205       if( m_to==m_tok )
00206         advance();
00207       break;
00208     case CREATE_DEFAULT:
00209       m_target->removeToken();
00210       advance();
00211       break;
00212     case CREATE_OTHER:
00213       m_target->removeToken();
00214       ++m_pred;
00215       if( m_predicates.end()==m_pred )
00216         advance();
00217       break;
00218     default:
00219       throw EuropaException("Unknown synchronization decision for timeline "+m_target->getTimeline()->toString());
00220   }
00221 }

00229 SynchronizationManager::SynchronizationManager(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg) 
00230 :EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawManager(cfg) {}

00234 // manipulators 
00235 
00236 void SynchronizationManager::handleInitialize() {
00237   m_assembly = &details::assembly(getPlanDatabase());
00238 }
00239 
00240 bool SynchronizationManager::staticMatch(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00241   return !details::InternalStateId::convertable(entity);
00242 }
00243 
00244 bool SynchronizationManager::dynamicMatch(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00245   if( staticMatch(entity) )
00246     return true;
00247   else {
00248     details::InternalStateId state(entity);
00249     if( state->lastObservation().isId() ) {
00250       return state->lastObservation()->getActiveToken()->end()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>state->getTime();
00251     }
00252     return false;
00253   }
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 EUROPA::IteratorId SynchronizationManager::createIterator() {
00258   return (new details::UpdateIterator(*this, *m_assembly))->getId();
00259 }
00260 
00261 // observers 
00262   
00263 std::string SynchronizationManager::toString(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) const {
00264   details::InternalStateId update(entity);
00265   std::ostringstream oss;
00266   oss<<"trex.STATE["<<update->getTime()<<"]: "<<update->getTimeline()->toString();
00267   
00268   return oss.str();
00269 }
